pages.text: 21|58|Tara pichata te'om murtisamuha curna-bicurna karai dile kerala danara murtitora bahirae; yate sihamte tara ocaralai ubhati yaya.
21|59|Sihamte ka’le, ‘amara upasyaborara saite kone e'i kama karaiche? Si niscaya an'yatama yalima’.
21|60|Kichumane ka’le, ‘ami ejana yurakaka e'iborara samalocana karaote sunicho; yaka ibraahima buli koraa haya’.
21|61|Sihamte ka’le, ‘teneha’le taka jana sanmukhata upasthita karaa, yate sihamte saksya haya’.
21|62|Sihamte ka’le, ‘he ibraahima! Tumiye amara upasyaborara saite e'i kama karaicha neki’
21|63|te'om ka’le, ‘baram ihamtara e'i pradhanajane'i kijani e'i kama karaiche, eteke e'iboraka sudhi coraa, yadi ihamta katha ka’ba parae’.
21|64|Tetiya sihamte nije'i punara bibecana karai dekhile arau ijane sijanaka ka’le, ‘niscaya tomaloke'i acala an'yayakarai’.
21|65|Tara pichata sihamtara sira nata ha’la arau ka’le, ‘tumi dekhuna jana'i ye, ihamte katha kaba noraarae’.
21|66|Te'om ka’le, ‘teneha’le tomaloke allahara paraibarte ene bastura ibadata karaa neki yitorae tomalokara kono upakara karaiba noraarae arau apakarao karaiba noraarae
21|67|‘dhika tomalokara prati arau allahara paraibarte tomaloke yiborara ibadata karaa se'iborara prati! Tathapi'o tomaloke nubujane’
21|68|sihamte ka’le, ‘yadi tomaloke kiba karaiba bicaraa tente iyaka ju'ita purai marai peloraa arau tomalokara upasyaborara sahaya karaa’.
21|69|Ami ka’lo, ‘he ju'i! Tumi ibraahimara babe sitala arau niraapada hai yoraa’.
21|70|Arau sihamte te'omra ksati sadhana karaara iccha karaichila. Kintu ami sihamtake'i bechi ksatigrasta karai dilo.
21|71|Arau ami te'omka arau lutaka ud'dhara karai lai ga’lo se'i desata, ya’ta srsti jagatara babe ami kalyana raakhicho.
21|72|Arau ami te'omka (ibraahimaka) dana karaichilo ichahakba lagate atiraikta puraskarasbaraupe dana karaichilo iyakubaka; arau pratyekake karaichilo satkarmaparaayana.
